posts.post_title: WTB T206 Polar Bear Back SGC 30/40 or PSA 2/3 (Cubs)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dustan Hedlin
Hey guys, I was going through my T206 Excel sheet tonight and noticed that I do not have any Polar Bear T206's in my collection.  I'd be open to the purchase of any Polar Bear backed T206's, but would prefer a Cubs player, since that is the first subset I am going for.  If I can't find a Cubs Polar Bear, I'll be open to others.  So far, here are the Cubs that I have.  Any others would do just fine.

Evers Johnny W/ Bat,CHI
Moran Pat
NeedhamThomas 
OverallOrval Portrait
PfefferFrancis
Pfeister Jake Seated
Reulbach Ed No Glove
SchulteWildfire Back
SchulteWildfire Front
Sheckard Jimmy Glove Show
Steinfeldt Harry Portrait
Zimmerman Heinie
